import { Component, OnInit, OnDestroy } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-task-management', templateUrl: './task-management.component.html', styleUrls: ['./task-management.component.css'] }) export class TaskManagementComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { ngOnInit(): void { document.body.classList.add('route-specific'); } ngOnDestroy(): void { document.body.classList.remove('route-specific'); } } { }
